citation.article-title: Revival of the names Spirochaeta litoralis, Spirochaeta zuelzerae and Spirochaeta aurantia.

p.s: Description of Spirochaeta litoralis sp. nov., nom. rev.

This organism was originally named and described by Hespell and Canale-Parola (8). A detailed study and description of the metabolism of this species has been published (9). Type strain: ATCC 27000 (= strain R1). The description of the type strain is identical to that of the species.
